http::swap

Swap two header objects. 

template<
    bool isRequest,
    class Fields>
void
swap(
    header< isRequest, Fields >& m1,
    header< isRequest, Fields >& m2);
  » more...

Swap two message objects. 

template<
    bool isRequest,
    class Body,
    class Fields>
void
swap(
    message< isRequest, Body, Fields >& m1,
    message< isRequest, Body, Fields >& m2);
